languages.text: "Так вознесем же молитву Императору за упокой души господина Беллардо и благополучие его наследников! Слово святейшему Капеллану".
"So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor for the repose of Master Bellardo's soul and the prosperity of his heirs! I now pass you over to our most reverend Chaplain."
languages.original_text: "Так вознесем же молитву Императору за упокой души господина Беллардо и благополучие его наследников! Слово святейшему Капеллану".

traits.locale_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor so that He may rest Master Bellardo's soul and so that his heirs may prosper! I'm now going to give the floor to the most holy Chaplain."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

traits.locale_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor so that He may rest Master Bellardo's soul and so that his heirs may prosper! I'm now going to give the floor to the most holy Chaplain."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

traits.locale_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor for the repose of Master Bellardo's soul and the prosperity of his heirs! I now pass you over to our most reverend Chaplain."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

traits.locale_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor for the repose of Master Bellardo's soul and the prosperity of his heirs! I now pass you over to our most reverend Chaplain."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

traits.locale_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor for the repose of Master Bellardo's soul and the prosperity of his heirs! I now pass you over to our most reverend Chaplain."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: “那么，让我们向帝皇祈祷吧！愿贝拉多大师的灵魂安息，愿他的家族繁荣昌盛！现在，请我们最尊敬的牧师来致辞吧。”
languages.original_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor for the repose of Master Bellardo's soul and the prosperity of his heirs! I now pass you over to our most reverend Chaplain."

traits.locale_text: “那么，让我们向帝皇祈祷吧！愿贝拉多大师的灵魂安息，愿他的家族繁荣昌盛！现在，请我们最尊敬的牧师来致辞吧。”
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: «¡Ofrezcamos, pues, una oración al Emperador por el descanso del alma del maestro Bellardo y la prosperidad de sus herederos! Le cedo ahora la palabra a nuestro reverendo Capellán».
languages.original_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor for the repose of Master Bellardo's soul and the prosperity of his heirs! I now pass you over to our most reverend Chaplain."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ofrezcamos, pues, una oración al Emperador por el descanso del alma del maestro Bellardo y la prosperidad de sus herederos! Le cedo ahora la palabra a nuestro reverendo Capellán».
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: 「この場を借りて、マスター・ベラルドのご冥福と彼の後継者の繁栄を願い、皇帝に祈りを捧げましょう！それでは、あとは我が敬虔なる教戒官に引き継ぎます」
languages.original_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor for the repose of Master Bellardo's soul and the prosperity of his heirs! I now pass you over to our most reverend Chaplain."

traits.locale_text: 「この場を借りて、マスター・ベラルドのご冥福と彼の後継者の繁栄を願い、皇帝に祈りを捧げましょう！それでは、あとは我が敬虔なる教戒官に引き継ぎます」
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: "So lasst uns denn ein Gebet zum Imperator sprechen, auf dass Meister Bellardos Seele Frieden findet und seine Erben ihren Wohlstand genießen können! Und damit übergebe ich an unseren überaus geschätzten Ordenspriester."
languages.original_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor for the repose of Master Bellardo's soul and the prosperity of his heirs! I now pass you over to our most reverend Chaplain."

traits.locale_text: "So lasst uns denn ein Gebet zum Imperator sprechen, auf dass Meister Bellardos Seele Frieden findet und seine Erben ihren Wohlstand genießen können! Und damit übergebe ich an unseren überaus geschätzten Ordenspriester."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: « Prions l'Empereur pour le repos de l'âme de maître Bellardo et la prospérité de ses héritiers ! Je donne maintenant la parole au révérend Chapelain. »
languages.original_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor for the repose of Master Bellardo's soul and the prosperity of his heirs! I now pass you over to our most reverend Chaplain."

traits.locale_text: « Prions l'Empereur pour le repos de l'âme de maître Bellardo et la prospérité de ses héritiers ! Je donne maintenant la parole au révérend Chapelain. »
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: "Üstat Bellardo'nun ebedî istirahatteki ruhu ve vârislerinin refahı için hepinizi İmparator'a duaya çağırıyorum ve sözü muhterem Papazımıza bırakıyorum."
languages.original_text: "So let us offer a prayer to the Emperor for the repose of Master Bellardo's soul and the prosperity of his heirs! I now pass you over to our most reverend Chaplain."

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Bellardo'nun ebedî istirahatteki ruhu ve vârislerinin refahı için hepinizi İmparator'a duaya çağırıyorum! Şimdi sizleri saygıdeğer Papaz ile baş başa bırakıyorum."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1
